xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/733791-Convergencia/Divergencia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3W0N7dYy0XaUcO13OrA1tbWwTQb.jpg In 2006 lugar a dudas and Centro Cultural de Cali in Cali, Colombia invited the visual artists Todd Ayoung and Carlos Andrade to participate in a workshop with local Cali artists. The workshop titled "Convergencia" was part of an artists residency at lugar a dudas (place of doubt) with Todd Ayoung and Carlos Andrade, and resulted in a collective exhibition at Centro Cultural de Cali called "Convergencia/Divergencia". The video loop was part of a larger art installation, investigating, through a video/audio montage, the right wing government of Álvaro Uribe Vélez, and everyday life of Colombian society. Convergencia/Divergencia
